chat.description: Format for transcribed conversations, created for the CHILDES project.
chat.displayName: CHAT (Codes for the Human Analysis of Transcripts)

cmdi.description: Metadata format initiated in the CLARIN project.

conll-u.description: Tab-delimited (TSV) format that includes support for dependency relations

csv.description: A simple tabular format used by e.g. MS Excel. Column names (word, lemma, pos) are assumed, comma is separator, double quote is (optional) quote character, backslash the escape character.

eaf.description: EAF format with Words, Lemma and PoS TIERs.

folia.description: A file format for linguistically annotated text. See https://proycon.github.io/folia/

naf.description: Simple indexing of the NAF Terms and Token layer

sketch-wpl.description: A format including word, lemma and PoS codes as well as punctuation, inline tags and document metadata.

tcf.description: A text corpus format developed for WebLicht.

tei-p4-legacy.description: A TEI P4 variant where part of speech is expected to be in the type attribute. Deprecated, will be removed eventually.
tei-p4-legacy.displayName: TEI P4 (legacy), contents in text, @type as PoS

tei-p5.description: A TEI P5 variant. The text element will be indexed as annotated contents. PoS tags should be in the pos attribute.
tei-p5.displayName: TEI P5, contents in text, @pos as PoS

tei-p5-legacy.description: A TEI P5 variant where part of speech is expected to be in the type attribute. Deprecated, will be removed eventually.
tei-p5-legacy.displayName: TEI P5 (legacy), contents in text, @type as PoS

testformat.description: A simple format for testing BlackLab functionality
testformat.displayName: Indexing format used for tests (see TestIndex)

tsv.description: A simple tabular format used by e.g. MS Excel. Column names (word, lemma, pos) are assumed, tab is separator, double quote is (optional) quote character, backslash the escape character.

tsv-frog.description: Tab-delimited (TSV) output produced by the Frog program
